plot: We know what radio sounds like, but what does radio look like? A portrait of the KBOO community radio station in Portland, Oregon, during a recent pledge drive.
title: Pledge Drive
plot_es: We know what radio sounds like, but what does radio look like? A portrait of the KBOO community radio station in Portland, Oregon, during a recent pledge drive.
